titleStmt.title: The mad man's morice; or, A warning for young-men to have a care, how they in love intangled are: wherein by experience you shall find, his trouble and grief with discontent of mind. To a pleasant new tune.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for A[lexander]. M[ilbourn]. and sold by the booksellers of London.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Heard you not lately of a man ..."
With one woodcut above the first two columns.
Place, date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
